com.nokia.maps.map

Class MapDisplayState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.maps.map.MapDisplayState

  • public class MapDisplayState
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the state of a MapDisplay.

    For example, it can be used to:

    • for complex map operations such as changing centre and zoom with one aggregated operation.
    • for storing a history of MapDisplay states.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapDisplayState(GeoCoordinate center, double zoomLevel)
      This method creates a new MapDisplayState with given centre and zoom level.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GeoCoordinate getCenter()
      This method retrieves the geographical coordinate at the centre of the map.
      double getZoomLevel()
      This method retrieves the zoom level of the map display.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapDisplayState

        public MapDisplayState(GeoCoordinate center,
               double zoomLevel)
        This method creates a new MapDisplayState with given centre and zoom level.
        Parameters:
        center - An object containing the coordinates of the centre of the map
        zoomLevel - the zoom level of the map

    • Method Detail

      • getCenter

        public GeoCoordinate getCenter()
        This method retrieves the geographical coordinate at the centre of the map.
        Returns:
        An object containing the coordinates of the centre of the map

      • getZoomLevel

        public double getZoomLevel()
        This method retrieves the zoom level of the map display. The higher the zoom level, the smaller the geographic area covered by the map, and the greater the detail shown.
        Returns:
        The zoom level
